title: Client issues
body: =_= over the past week ive had 3 leaver buster that requires me to wait 20 minutes every game 15 times. But this was not deserved. At random times after champ select my screen splits (a gap in the middle of the screen that my mouse cannot pass) as soon as the client launches (loading screen). This only happens whenever a match starts  but I am forced to restart my whole pc to fix this. This has never happened with any game that I played. I am worried about getting my account banned because of too much afk at the start of the game. Is this a problem with my client or my pc? ( This only happens with league)

replies.body:
1. Always test in custom games
2. Update your graphics card drivers
3. Repair your client
4. Close any other programs you have running (background programs too)
5. Clean reinstall your game with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool)
6. Submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) detailing your issue (include screenshots if at all possible).

___
** RE Support:** The login for the support page and the website (boards) are separate. 
https://i.imgur.com/IrSBuzi.png?noredirect

There are currently issues with the login transition preventing players from easily logging into support. There are two current workarounds:

1. Open the support page in an incognito/private window and follow the process as normal, pressing the login button when prompted.

2. Log out of the website **from the support page**, and then follow the process as normal, pressing login when prompted.

If your support page has the blank "OC" login in the top right, you're good to go. If it only has your summoner icon with "OCEANIA" it means the support page is seeing you as logged in on the website and not in support. You need to follow one of the steps above.
